ItemDesc: Increase DEF of all allies by <unbreak>25%</unbreak> in the next battle.
ItemBGDesc: A sweet and tangy dessert made of lemon juice and red caviar. The original recipe included a herring, which emitted a pungent odor disliked by the public. The negative feedback resulted in the current version containing only red caviar. "They never said it was a canned herring!"
